If you want to learn about banking software systems, these books can help you build a solid foundation:

1. Core Banking Systems & Architecture

📘 “Banking Systems and Electronic Commerce: Management & Applications” – by Mohamed Rafiqul Islam

  • Covers core banking software, online banking, and electronic payments.
  • Good for understanding the fundamentals of banking IT systems.

📘 “Core Banking Solution: Evaluation of Security and Controls” – by Subhash Chandra Parija

  • Explains how core banking software works and the security challenges involved.
  • Covers systems like Finacle, T24 (Temenos), and FLEXCUBE.

📘 “Core Banking Transformation: Measuring the Impact of Banking Technology” – by Dan Jones & Sally Johnson

  • Discusses real-life case studies of banks transitioning to new software.
  • Great for understanding implementation challenges and strategies.

2. Digital Banking & FinTech

📘 “Bank 4.0: Banking Everywhere, Never at a Bank” – by Brett King

  • Explains how digital banking platforms and mobile banking are shaping the industry.
  • Covers APIs, cloud banking, and the shift from traditional banking software.

📘 “FinTech: The Impact and Influence on Banking and Finance” – by Igor Pejic

  • Discusses modern banking solutions, blockchain, AI, and digital payments.
  • Ideal for those interested in the future of banking software.

3. Banking Security & Risk Management

📘 “Managing Risks of IT in Banks: A Practitioner’s Guide” – by D. Shanmuganathan

  • Focuses on risk management in banking IT systems.
  • Covers cybersecurity, fraud detection, and regulatory compliance.

📘 “Financial Services IT: Getting the Best from Technology” – by Anne Boden (Founder of Starling Bank)

  • Discusses how banks choose software solutions and manage security risks.
  • Explores cloud computing, open banking, and real-time payments.

4. Blockchain & Distributed Ledger in Banking

📘 “Blockchain Basics: A Non-Technical Introduction in 25 Steps” – by Daniel Drescher

  • Perfect for beginners who want to understand blockchain and its use in banking.
  • Helps in learning about Axoni, Ripple, and Corda ledger technologies.

📘 “Blockchain and the Future of Banking” – by David L. Shrier

  • Covers how distributed ledger technologies (DLT) like Corda and Hyperledger are being adopted by banks.
  • Discusses regulatory challenges and implementation strategies.
